background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; What do you mean? &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">271</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">328</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">1541</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">R</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; </span></font><font color="#878700"><span style="color: #878700; background: #030303">Aryana's Spring.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303"> (</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">ruins of Caanae.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">) </span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">Filling the firmament is a lattice of heavy grey clouds.</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> The once grand market square of ancient Caanae surrounds this centralized point, where the ground has been shaken and torn apart by a catastrophic event. Three meticulously carved pillars embossed with runic scripts lie collapsed upon the ground. The remnants of a gold-trimmed roof lean askew to one side of the stone pile, blocking the view from outside of all the wonders housed within this temple. Barely standing under the weight of a pillar is a marble altar, which has been etched with scars and scratches from the passage of time and elements. The structure of the pillars silently displays how it was once a small but impressive temple; the inscriptions upon the altar indicate it to have been built in honor of Avasyu. Flowing freely from the cracks in the centre is a passage of pure water, perhaps the purest known in the realm of Aetherius.</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303"> The spring of crystalline water gushes forth from the ruins in a fountain, tumbling over the pillars to form a shallow and brilliant river among the stones, its ethereal light a source of inspiration and life. A well-carved statue of light grey granite stands here, depicting a Sylayan Noctusari in a pose of utter cowardice. A shattered statue of Slythera, a goblin demonologist lies in ruin here. A detailed statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a man with demonic features in the throes of feeble rage. A meticulous marble statue of a towering puffin poses here, perched atop an ornate onyx pedestal, the large jade bowl at the base filled with offerings. An intricately carved statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a Lycaean hunter taking to his heels. A stunning statue of a ssylsin stands here, marble foam about its mouth. A comfortable leather sofa sits here. A small sign points into a market stall. The shrunken head of Lluhon has been left here, the last torments of life still visible upon his face. With a wild look in his eye, a feral paint stallion stands heatedly here as he stomps and paces recklessly. A spirited Shaahri stallion trots about. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">st the Cleric stands here, his gaze cast over the Springs. A black, murky mist has settled here. Dripping with blood, an inverted pentagram floats in mid-air. The shadows bend and contort to the form of this nightmare, red eyes glaring from out of the darkness. Hovering on two scarlet leathery wings, this daemonite seems to have a vicious glint to its eyes. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. </span></font><font color="#3737FF"><span style="color: #3737FF; background: #030303">You see exits leading north, east, south, west, in, and a crumbling pathway leads down</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">. &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">271</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">328</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">m </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1331</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">e </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1541</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">R</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; Your aura of weapons rebounding disappears. [</span></font><font color="#878700"><span style="color: #878700; background: #030303">rebounding</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">] You order a small winged daemonite to kill </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">. A small winged daemonite obeys your command. &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">271</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">328</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">m </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1331</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">e </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1541</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#999999"><span style="color: #999999; background: #030303">-</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; (</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">smoke pipe with linseed</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">) You order a fiendish nightmare to kill </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">. A fiendish nightmare obeys your command. &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">271</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303"> Toma</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303"> - </span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">By the forest's edge </span></font><font color="#999999"><span style="color: #999999; background: #030303">(</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">2648</span></font><font color="#999999"><span style="color: #999999; background: #030303">)</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303"> - </span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">Heartlands. </span></font><font color="#000087"><span style="color: #000087; background: #030303">------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">There are 50 players on this plane and 9 players on other planes. </span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">286</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">296</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">m </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1331</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">e </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1534</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">R</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; </span></font><font color="#878700"><span style="color: #878700; background: #030303">Aryana's Spring.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303"> (</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">ruins of Caanae.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">) </span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">Filling the firmament is a lattice of heavy grey clouds.</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> The once grand market square of ancient Caanae surrounds this centralized point, where the ground has been shaken and torn apart by a catastrophic event. Three meticulously carved pillars embossed with runic scripts lie collapsed upon the ground. The remnants of a gold-trimmed roof lean askew to one side of the stone pile, blocking the view from outside of all the wonders housed within this temple. Barely standing under the weight of a pillar is a marble altar, which has been etched with scars and scratches from the passage of time and elements. The structure of the pillars silently displays how it was once a small but impressive temple; the inscriptions upon the altar indicate it to have been built in honor of Avasyu. Flowing freely from the cracks in the centre is a passage of pure water, perhaps the purest known in the realm of Aetherius.</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303"> The spring of crystalline water gushes forth from the ruins in a fountain, tumbling over the pillars to form a shallow and brilliant river among the stones, its ethereal light a source of inspiration and life. A well-carved statue of light grey granite stands here, depicting a Sylayan Noctusari in a pose of utter cowardice. A shattered statue of Slythera, a goblin demonologist lies in ruin here. A detailed statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a man with demonic features in the throes of feeble rage. A meticulous marble statue of a towering puffin poses here, perched atop an ornate onyx pedestal, the large jade bowl at the base filled with offerings. An intricately carved statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a Lycaean hunter taking to his heels. A stunning statue of a ssylsin stands here, marble foam about its mouth. A comfortable leather sofa sits here. A small sign points into a market stall. The shrunken head of Lluhon has been left here, the last torments of life still visible upon his face. With a wild look in his eye, a feral paint stallion stands heatedly here as he stomps and paces recklessly. A spirited Shaahri stallion trots about. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">st the Cleric stands here, his gaze cast over the Springs. A black, murky mist has settled here. Dripping with blood, an inverted pentagram floats in mid-air. The shadows bend and contort to the form of this nightmare, red eyes glaring from out of the darkness. Hovering on two scarlet leathery wings, this daemonite seems to have a vicious glint to its eyes. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. </span></font><font color="#3737FF"><span style="color: #3737FF; background: #030303">You see exits leading north, east, south, west, in, and a crumbling pathway leads down</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">. &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">286</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; A large lizard is here, sunning itself happily. A brown and white dog romps around playfully, wagging his tail and searching for bones.</span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303"> The Emir of Dance, </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303"> Ashtear, Lightning Breaker is here. background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; A look of extreme focus crosses the face of </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">R</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; </span></font><font color="#878700"><span style="color: #878700; background: #030303">Aryana's Spring.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303"> (</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">ruins of Caanae.</span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">) </span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">Filling the firmament is a lattice of heavy grey clouds. The spring of crystalline water gushes forth from the ruins in a fountain, tumbling over the pillars to form a shallow and brilliant river among the stones, its ethereal light a source of inspiration and life. A well-carved statue of light grey granite stands here, depicting a Sylayan Noctusari in a pose of utter cowardice. A shattered statue of Slythera, a goblin demonologist lies in ruin here. A detailed statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a man with demonic features in the throes of feeble rage. A meticulous marble statue of a towering puffin poses here, perched atop an ornate onyx pedestal, the large jade bowl at the base filled with offerings. An intricately carved statue of light grey granite sets here depicting a Lycaean hunter taking to his heels. A stunning statue of a ssylsin stands here, marble foam about its mouth. A comfortable leather sofa sits here. A small sign points into a market stall. The shrunken head of Lluhon has been left here, the last torments of life still visible upon his face. With a wild look in his eye, a feral paint stallion stands heatedly here as he stomps and paces recklessly. A spirited Shaahri stallion trots about. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#008787"><span style="color: #008787; background: #030303">st the Cleric stands here, his gaze cast over the Springs. A black, murky mist has settled here. Dripping with blood, an inverted pentagram floats in mid-air. The shadows bend and contort to the form of this nightmare, red eyes glaring from out of the darkness. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. Its beady eyes searching for some new prey, a lithe black fox slinks around the area. The towering presence of Peravus, ancient Caananite seems to dominate the room here. Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. </span></font><font color="#3737FF"><span style="color: #3737FF; background: #030303">You see exits leading north, east, south, west, in, and a crumbling pathway leads down</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">. &lt;</span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">271</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">h </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">283</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">m </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1331</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">e </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">1497</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">w 26%&gt; &lt;</span></font><font color="#008700"><span style="color: #008700; background: #030303">eb </span></font><font color="#37FFFF"><span style="color: #37FFFF; background: #030303">DB</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303"> </span></font><font color="#37FF37"><span style="color: #37FF37; background: #030303">R</span></font><font color="#FFFF37"><span style="color: #FFFF37; background: #030303">M</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2; background: #030303">&gt; You bid your Ouroboros to draw your enemies closer. Niarchos's Ouroboros begins slowly turning and beckoning in all directions. </span></font><font color="#FF3737"><span style="color: #FF3737; background: #030303">Toma</span></font><font color="#C2C2C2"><span style="color: #C2C2C2;
